textAfterTable: 15 Songs Customer Reviews Killing Overkill           by BoingoBoy The Fiery Furnaces have created some of the greatest organized noise ever to be put onto a CD, but even noisemakers calm down. This is basically the FF album you can listen to at night and bring home to your parents: its calmer, more piano-driven than their other albums, and focused more on poppy, fun songs. The fast-paced lyrical wonder of Eleanor is still there, as well as the tight, semi-fractured instrumentation of brother Matt. All in all, a wonderful experience from beginning to end.
